messages.author: Evan Martin
messages.text: Couldn't you move this destroy up a bunch and then smash together these family_names_match tests (and even perhaps elminiate the bool)?

messages.author: agl
messages.text:
On 2008/12/03 19:19:24, Evan Martin wrote:
> Couldn't you move this destroy up a bunch and then smash together these
> family_names_match tests (and even perhaps elminiate the bool)?

Well, I certainly remove the fprintf there :) However, the post_match_family string points into this object, so it cannot be destroyed before family_names_match is calculated.
